hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.Shadow Temple Early Silver Rupee Chest: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to #the Tower#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Boulder Maze Lower Chest

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.
